# Product.PurchaseResult.userCancelled

**Case**

The user canceled the purchase.

## Declaration

```swift
case userCancelled
```

## Getting the Purchase Results

- **Product.PurchaseResult.success(_:)**: The purchase succeeded and results in a transaction.
- **Product.PurchaseResult.pending**: The purchase is pending, and requires action from the customer.

items.description: The purchase succeeded and results in a transaction.
items.name: Product.PurchaseResult.success(_:)

items.description: The purchase is pending, and requires action from the customer.
